org.epics.ca.impl.remote
Class IntrospectionRegistry

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.ca.impl.remote.IntrospectionRegistry

public final class IntrospectionRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

PVData Structure registry. Registry is used to cache introspection interfaces to minimize network traffic.

Author:
msekoranja

Field Summary
static byte FULL_WITH_ID_TYPE_CODE
          Serialization contains an ID (that can be used later, if cached) and full interface description.

static byte ONLY_ID_TYPE_CODE

reset

public void reset()
Reset registry, i.e. must be done when transport is changed (server restarted).
